Good Idea, but too much basics mssing What I like: (1.) Realtime exchange of text/multimedia messages vs. SMS (2.) You know when messages reach/are read (3.) You send the chat history to email for archiving ==What I do not like== (A.) you cannot switch off ONLINE status (I do not want to be chased and told, "hey you were online, you read it, you didn't respond to my text, I lost 100 EUR because of that...."). Why only apple app has this feature (I was told)? (B.) that you cannot switch the keyboard language based on the chat partner. I am constantly switching from English to German and vice-versa. (C.) the many incoming-sounds. If friends (?) fire 5 messages in 10 seconds, why does WA fire a sound for each? And while typing, I think still the sound is firing. We need to have more control, on how many notification sounds shall occur. How about Once per n minutes also option to make vibration for all other incoming text until next main sound? Any other suggestions? (D.) Night time should be able to block, on cell-phone level (block notifications), but within WA. "Do not disturb" sign? (F.) why not Auto responders, also in case of D. when I want to block a time-slot, e.g. night time?? Full Review
